storyInfo: Click, still a novice at the time, participates in the shooting of an adventure video. After getting the wits scared out of her, she realizes that everything was caused by a musbeast. Just when the adventure video's view count starts to stagnate, Click releases her own myth-busting video to drive both to the top of the charts.

attributes.content: Hey everyone! It's your old friend, Nancy!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: And your brand new friend, Click!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Huh? Hold up, Click! Stop messing around!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Ahem! After watching all those videos, I'm sure you know this 'abandoned factory' pretty well.
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Legend has it that it used to be the nomadic plate of a Columbian pharmaceutical company, but was abandoned for some reason. The employees committed mass suicide, and even the boss mysteriously went missing in the middle of bustling Trimounts.
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: But that's not all...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Though many brave adventurers have visited here, the story goes that most of them vanished, and the few who made it back have been hospitalized ever since, unable to say a word.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: At the same time, more people began subscribing to an alternative version of the legend—that the boss never went missing, but instead killed himself, and those who venture deep into the factory end up cursed!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: That's enough chit-chat though, I'm starting to get chills all over! It's not like I'm scared or anything, but—
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: That's because we made it here to the abandoned factory! Take a look, everyone—less than fifty meters behind us is the entrance to the infamous, abandoned plate!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: We're gonna take you in to explore the truth behind this abandoned factory, and pull back the curtain on this paranormal phenomenon!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: I'm your brand new friend, Click!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Cut! Perfect!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Lights! Lights! Robbie, how many times have I told you to keep a close eye on the lighting? You make me look good, and that nabs the audience's attention!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: I can't do it! Th-This place is way too scary!
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: And Click, where'd you pop out from? Are you really a newbie coming along for your first shoot? I've never seen a fresh face as enthusiastic as you.
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: That's how you spice up a video! You keep rattling off those bland, rehashed intros and I'll click off the page right away!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Alright, alright. I can cut you some slack since it's just the intro, but after we head in, I need you to stick to the script, alright? I've got everything here planned out very carefully. We can't have it going wrong.
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Hey, no running around!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Remember, Robbie, you're gonna let out a piercing scream after you go through that door. Then, you fake a fall toward the rocks next to you and lead the camera over to transition to our next scene—
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Click, after you film him screaming, head down the hallway and we'll be good for the transition—You catch all that?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Got it!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: 'Make sure we don't get stuck with a crappy view count. Not only is it humiliating, it's also a waste of money. Can't keep filming if you don't have money, and can't make money if you don't keep filming.' See, I memorized it!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Cap'n, how about moving this line up to the opener? It'll definitely make things spicier!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Urgh... I feel another headache coming on...
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: But I have to say, that doesn't seem like a bad idea.
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Testing, testing. We getting a signal in here? Can you hear me?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Gah! Don't scare me like that! Lemme turn the volume down first... Thought I was gonna go deaf.
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: Loud and clear. Let's start filming!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: ––Yo, guys! We're inside the abandoned factory now.
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: We each have our own cameras, recording everything we see on our expedition to provide you the most authentic footage!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: I'll start heading down from the top of the building, while Click and Robbie go up from the first floor. We'll set off at the same time and explore from two different directions, then meet in the middle. Let's find out for ourselves what this curse is all about!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Alright, you guys get going too!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Hmm, Robbie, there's something written here. Lemme see... 'Stay away, or you'll die.'
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: 'The curse is real!' 'Save me!' 'Don't look back.'
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: S-S-Stop talking and start shooting! Let me focus here...
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: *Rustling sounds*
Hehe, can I draw something on the wall? Lemme add... myself doing a V-pose here! Peace, peace!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: 'Sup, everyone. The time now is 12:15 a.m. on July 13th, and we've just entered the first floor lobby of this abandoned factory.
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: It sure is cold in here. I remember someone came in to film, and ended up going insane after they got back.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Shall we commemorate the occasion as well? Then, we can catalogue everything we see here. I'm sure the others are dying to know about it too. C'mon, I'll stand over here—
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: What's that?
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: A bloated fowlbeast... Oh, some sort of taxidermy?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: What is something like that doing here? Isn't this supposed to be an abandoned factory?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: This looks more like something you'd see in a hospital...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Are we still filming...?
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: L-Let's worry about that later...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: *Rustling sounds*
Okay then... By the way, do you hear that sound I keep hearing?
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: What sound? I'm too focused on the stench from this puddle of liquid.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Let's... keep recording, I guess?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: The two continue down the barren hall, the strange scent prickling at their sinuses, creating an uncanny atmosphere.
It is as if they have been cut off from the outside world, completely engulfed and surrounded by something that should not exist.
We've followed the strange noises down the corridor, and have now arrived at the deepest part of the first floor.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: There are rows of rooms to our sides that feel like they haven't seen visitors in years. Let's pick a door and see what's inside.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*... Alright, I'll do it...
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: Whew...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: The door opened on its own?
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: Were you the one knocking on the door just now?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: N-No, it wasn't me.
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: Well, it wasn't me either...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: S-S-Stop trying to freak me out...
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: (*Gulps*) Let's head in and take a look?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: I, I think I'm good...
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: Wanna stay behind me then? Also, give the boss an update on how we're doing. We're almost done shooting up here. We should start heading upstairs.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Click tightly grips the video camera in her hands.
It's pitch-dark all around her and she can't see a thing. Only through the hazy green fog of the small night-vision screen on the side of the camera does she notice a small, discolored corridor.
Everything starts to feel surreal. She waits for an answer from her crewmate.
*Rustling sounds*
Robbie?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Click turns around, but there's nobody behind her.
...Robbie? Where'd you go?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: No response. There is a loud sound of a heavy object falling to a ground, followed by a whimper like that of a wounded beast. From the darkness comes a faint sound of claws scratching against the ground.
*Loud rustling sounds*
Robbie? Where are you?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: ...Robbie, is that you?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Click runs past several empty rooms, one after another, the video camera's small night-vision screen already having become her eyes.
She can't control the wild thoughts prancing through her mind—
If... If there really was something lurking in the dark, would she be able to sense it? Would she be able to... get away from it?
Is there really... nobody behind her?
I'm over here! Hurry–
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: Robbie! You scared me half to death! Didn't we talk about running off? Where'd you go, all of a sudden?!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: *huff*... *huff*... How'd you even run this far?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Robbie? Where are you? I don't see you yet. It's too dark in here...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Ugh... And what's with all these ashes?!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Hurry and get over here! I found it––
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: I still don't see you though!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Click raises the video camera again. For some reason, hardly any time passes before its battery runs out.
The red battery warning icon keeps flashing, its flickering casting figure-like shadows across the walls.
Robbie, wave for me real quick?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: I found it—
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer?

attributes.content: Found it—
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer?

attributes.content: Vague traces of light and shadow interplay in front of him, as if the cowardly man is forced to repeat the same lines over and over.
Click lets out a sigh of relief.
How'd you get all the way over here? I thought you were too scared to go off alone!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Are you pretending to be scared? Is this just a bit for the video?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Well... It's solid acting, but you're not gonna spook me that easily, you know?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Robbie doesn't respond. Click reaches over to pat him on the shoulder.
She could've sworn it was Robbie.
Wait... is that really Robbie?
Bam!
Click's hand hits a hard object.
The wooden skeleton collapses to the ground, the rags on it fluttering in the wind when that voice rings out again—
I found it—I found it—
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer?

attributes.content: Gaah!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Ka-chack!
The place where sound came from was nothing more than a mess of tangled wires. Two red signal lights flicker, pause, and then repetitive sounds come from beneath the debris.
'I'm over here! Hurry up! I found it—'
'I found it—I found it—'
'I found it—'
Robbie? Robbie! Why's my video camera completely out of juice already?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Robbie? Captain? Oh right, the captain. I still have my comms terminal... Captain! Where are you? Robbie's gone missing!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Pick up... Please, pick up...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: ...Click... missing...? Rob... hurry up...!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Click... get out... dark...
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Captain! Captain? What's wrong with this thing all of a sudden? Ugh...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: What time is it...? Huh? How is it still 12:15?! I...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Why am I back on the first floor? Didn't I go upstairs? Hmm, maybe the second floor looks the same... Yeah, that's gotta be it...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Wait, this is me... doing a V pose...?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Does that mean... I'm on the first floor?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: *Rustling sounds*
Suddenly, a noise comes from the video camera. Click looks down: on the screen swirling with snowflakes is Robbie's pale face, plastered with scarlet wounds.
His lifeless eyes look straight into the camera before he lets out a horrific scream—
Aaaaaaaahhhhhhhh!!
Aaaaaaaahhhhhhhh!!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Aaaaaaaahhhhhhhh––––!!
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: Perfection! That's the ticket, Click! We've got all the footage we need. Our new video's gonna go viral for sure! Let's pack it up, everyone!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: I've already decided how I'm gonna edit this. So if you have any ideas, feel free to chime in. C'mon, c'mon, we're aiming for the top!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: ...Click?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: (So scared... I don't wanna think about it anymore...)
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: (Finally outta there... Soon I can head back to my room, curl up with my blanket, and enjoy some snacks...)
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: The door... The door opened on its own!
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: Were you the one knocking on the door just now?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: N-No, it wasn't me.
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: Well, it wasn't me either...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: *Rustling sounds*
(No! I need to get this out of my head...)
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: (I'm out. I'm already out. None of this is real...)
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: 'I'm over here! Hurry up! I found it—'
'I found it—I found it—'
'I found it!'
*Rustling sounds*
(Aaaaaaaahhhhhhhh––––!!)
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: (What was that noise the whole time?! Was someone else in there?)
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Click?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: *gasp*... *gasp*...!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Come in, Click. Are you reading me?! Hey, after I finish editing, I'll treat you guys to dinner!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Goddamned kurwa bloody ta ma de hell—!
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: He was like this when I found him. He was going around punching trees, apparently chasing after something that scared him in the factory. There probably aren't a whole lot of leaves left in that patch of the woods.
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: C'mere, Click. Let's trim the video together. Didn't you always say you wanted to scrounge up enough money to film your own videos? When we top the charts, I'll give you a bonus!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Oh... Sure.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: (The captain seems so calm, but Robbie's scared out of his mind... Weren't we in the same place?)
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: (Ugh... Do I work on the video first, or calm Robbie down? Or maybe, I need to calm myself down...)
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Hyah! Dammit, can't believe I'm getting spooked by my own video.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Any idea what happened to make Robbie like this? He still hasn't recovered.
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Can't tell... But this scene is pretty terrifying, for sure. You can see the camera shaking and hear his panting, and you even get glimpses of his face every now and then.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Oh, I don't mean him, he's not what's scary.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: But, those wounds on his face definitely aren't something he could make by himself, and I kept hearing rustling sounds the whole time...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: One sec! Let's cut here to add a transition and some narration. Starting from the staircase, then—
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Mmhmm. Turn up the brightness, blur out all the garbage, and then amplify the breathing sounds...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: The door opening, the scream, the chase up the stairs. Cut here, then swap over to my perspective...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: *Rustling sounds*
Cap'n, do you hear that?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Yeah... What is it?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: *Rustling sounds*
I heard the very same sound! It was when I was on the roof. I got your call, and then...
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: *Rustling sounds*
Though she's returned to the light of day, Click still feels like she's in that dark factory.
She leans closer to the monitor, to the constantly-shaking perspective, the chaotic background sounds, and Robbie's panicked panting. Click turns up the brightness.
Two little red beads suddenly appear in the corner of the video, directly facing the camera. They begin to draw closer.
*Rustling sounds*
Squeak, squeak!
Hold up, what is that...?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: A musbeast?!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: It's a freakin' chonker!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Where? Lemme see.
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Over there! Look!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Wait, why's there one over here too?!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Ah! It, it jumped on Robbie's face and bit the heck out of him! After that... Robbie dropped the video camera, and it jumped out the window!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Let me see!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Wait a damned second, there's another one over here! Why are there so many of 'em?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Wait, don't tell me, the abandoned factory... is nothing more than a musbeast den?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: No way! So much stuff was going on in there. There was that knocking sound, even though nobody was at the door, and then it opened on its own!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Then, Robbie's video camera started looping! Also, I couldn't get up to the second floor, no matter how hard I tried, and time stopped! No matter which way I took, the time was stuck at 12:15 and I kept going around in circles on the first floor!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: L-Let me see for myself!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Click drags the loading bar aside.
Also, I lost contact with you!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: And here!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Our comms went down because... a musbeast tinkled on the base station and caused it to short circuit?!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Then... Then, why was I stuck on the first floor?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: And here!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: They chewed through the stairs because they were nesting there?!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: And the time got stuck at 12:15 because they ruined my watch?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: ...What?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Squeak, squeak!
attributes.name: Musbeast

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: You little runt, I see you now! Hahaha! I swear upon my honor I will slay you this day––
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: (Darts away hurriedly)
attributes.name: Musbeast

attributes.content: GET–– BACK–– HERE––!!
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: Captain, does this mean... there isn't actually any paranormal stuff going on? It was all the fault of a chonky musbeast?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: All of it?!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Huh... so it was just a musbeast after all...
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: B-But, if we come out with the truth in our video, it won't make for good content...
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: We've already made our trailer, and everyone's expecting some horror factory adventure story, either to get a fright themselves or to watch our reactions. But a musbeast? That's just so boring.
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: What should we do then?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Let's stick to the original plan. It's a horror video, plain and simple. We'll cut the part where the musbeast shows up.
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Just like all the junk you blurred out. People want a bit of drama in their videos, and nobody's gonna be interested if it's too ordinary and realistic.
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: See what people are talking about on our trailer page? We can't go wrong giving them what they want to see!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Umm...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: You don't like the sound of that?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Good grief, Click! Why are you acting like a novice who's never touched a video camera before? Do you think we're misleading our audience or something? C'mere, listen up. This has nothing to do with deceiving anyone...
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: That's not what I meant!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: I totally agree with you!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: I think you made a very good point! That's something everyone can sink their teeth into.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Sink... their teeth into... me?
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: You think I'm gonna let you eat me? Ol' Robbie here's gonna knock the daylight outta you––
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: Calm down, Robbie! That's just a rock––
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: How's it looking, Cap'n? Anything that needs editing?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Nothing else? Are we good then?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Robbie? Are you feeling better yet? I'm about to upload the video. In three, two, one!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: C'mon, c'mon! Refresh, refresh! I wanna see the comments!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: The views are starting to shoot up! What are people saying?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: I don't see anything in the comments section yet, they're probably still watching. But, the number of likes is going up quickly. We're about to break a thousand already!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: The featured video at the top of the charts has 30,000 views, and we've already reached 5,000... No, 8,000!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: The comments are starting to roll in! 'I started screaming along with that guy!' 'Nopenopenope, don't wanna watch! Someone tell me what's behind the door?' 'Every time the camera perspective changes, my heart skips a beat!'
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Whew, my friends are starting to DM me. Looks like they're envious!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Wait, what? We've already reached 10,000 views?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: C'mooooon, reach 30,000! Pleaaaase! I wanna top the charts at least one time!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: One sec. I'm gonna refresh real quick. There might be a little delay.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Hmm, it seems like...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Engagements are starting to slow down... 25,000. Let's wait and see what happens?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Mmhmm!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Hey, Cap'n, second place is already really impressive! Plus, we just uploaded the video. Who knows, we might take the top spot in the evening!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Look at the video at the top of the charts. It's just a guy walking along, munching on street food with a smile on his face. He's not even saying anything other than 'It's so delicious, you've gotta come down to try it!' We can top this for sure.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: You stole the words right outta my mouth, girl.
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: But, I should be the one consoling you, not the other way around. You should feel proud that you pulled this off on your very first shoot.
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Teehee.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: C'mon, we've been working hard all day and night, so I'll go grab food? We've been so busy I'm practically starving here.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Pizza or honey biscuits? Or maybe you're in the mood for some cured meat?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Gimme beer! Lots of beer!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Hahaha! I'm gonna barbecue this whole factory!
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: Huh? Is he still not back to normal?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Two days later...
Ugh, it's been two whole days, and we're still stuck at second. Why... can't we get more than a few hundred views? Are we seriously going to lose to some random shopping and eating video?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: If we don't get enough money this time, we're gonna be tight on food budget for next month, and it'll also push Click's startup fund back a few more months.
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: And... what's that burning smell?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*, *cough* *cough*!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Urgh! Where's all this smoke coming from? What's going on with our equipment?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Click? Robbie?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: It's fine! It's fine! There's way too many comments on the video, so it's having a hard time loading!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Too many comments? Didn't our video get stuck in second place?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Wait, wait. What's going on? There's a new video at the top of the list now? 'Truth Demystified: The Supernatural Abandoned Factory'?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: This video is of the same place we went to... Wait, no, this is our footage! I can hear Robbie's voice! And... it's all the clips with the musbeast!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Click?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: Teehee.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Wanna guess who made this new video?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Take a look! It's driving the view count on our adventure video up! After watching the myth-busting video, people are re-watching the full version and everyone's trying to find the musbeast in the comments in real time!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Huh? Our video just hit the top of the list?
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: And the Demystified video is in second place!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: (Smugly shakes the terminal that is giving off smoke, overloaded by the maxed out comments section)
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Now let's see where that shopping video is in comparison!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: My goodness, Click!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: As the wispy black smoke curls around the room, Robbie lets out two powerful sneezes.
As if waking up from a dream, he lets go of the folding chair he was trying to pummel just a moment ago, and sees that the video he starred in has reached over 50,000 views.
Huh? Wooooah! We're number one? We're number one?!
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: Click! Am I dreaming?! Or did I die in the factory?
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: Where am I? Is this Columbia or Bolívar?
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: The teammates squeeze in front of the terminal, watching the adventure video compete for the top spot with the myth-busting video, their view counts continuing to skyrocket.
A notification pops up from the background and the revenue figures from the two videos start to roll in as well, causing more black smoke to leak from the terminal.
Yaaaaay!!
attributes.name: Lighting Engineer

attributes.content: We're eatin' good–!
attributes.name: Camera Crew Leader

attributes.content: My startup fund!
attributes.name: Click
